Request.description: Approval request. It may have child requests. Only a leaf node request can have workflow_id

state.description: The state of the request. Possible value: canceled, completed, failed, notified, skipped, or started

decision.description: Approval decision. Possible value: undecided, approved, canceled, denied, or error

reason.description: Reason for the decision. Optional. Present normally when the decision is denied

workflow_id.description: Associate workflow id. Available only if the request is a leaf node

notified_at.description: Timestamp of notification sent to approvers

finished_at.description: Timestamp of finishing (skipped, canceled, or completed)

group_name.description: Name of approver group(s) assigned to approve this request

Workflow.description: The workflow to process approval requests. Each workflow is linked to multiple groups of approvals.

sequence.description: an indicator of the execution order for selected workflows

group_refs.description: Group reference ids associated with workflow
